channel.title: Posts on Cecilia's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cecilia's Blog

item.title: How does early stopping affect A/B experiment?
item.description: In the tech industry, we use controlled experiments to learn and make decisions at every step of product development, from design to algorithms. When the experiment is about a single change, such as changing the layout of the UI or using a different machine learning algorithm, the methodology is often called A/B testing. While is all fashionable and new to use A/B testing, the technique behind the scene, hypothesis testing, has been around for a long time.

item.title: Crucial Conversation
item.description: 九月初的时候我承诺我要在一个月之内读完《Crucial Conversations》这本书，并且学会优雅的扯头花。当时我以为我拥有这本书，当我

item.title: The Element of Style
item.description: Elementary Rules Of Usage 1. Form the possessive singular of nouns by add ‘s. 2. In a series of three or more terms with a single conjunction, use a comma after each term except the last. 3. Enclose parenthetic expressions between commas. 4. Place a comma before conjunction introducing an independent clause. 5. Do not join independent clauses with a comma. 6. Do not break sentences in two.

item.title: Ohana, Hawaii
item.description: 时隔一年零两个月又八天，在生日的当天迎着湿润温暖的海风再次降落在夏威夷。这次选择的第一站是 Island of Hawaii，也就是因为面积最大而得名的大岛 （

item.title: Aloha, Hawaii
item.description: “No alien land in all the world has any deep strong charm for me but that one, no other land could so longingly and so beseechingly haunt me, sleeping and walking, through half a lifetime, as that one has done." – Mark Twain 夏威夷的七天，仿佛逃离尘世的七天，所有的工作、寒冷
